Items.Name: Destroy the MacGuffin in Mount Doom
Items.Description: An adventure where you must destroy the MacGuffin in Mount Doom
Items.DescriptionTemplate: To destroy the {{Faction.Boss}}'s source of power and end the threat of the {{Faction}} You must take the {{MacGuffin}} to {{Location}} and cast it into the flames

Items.Name: Escape
Items.Description: An Adventure where you need to run away
Items.DescriptionTemplate: The {{Faction.Boss}} chases you across {{Environment}} Fly you fool!

Items.Name: Steal the MacGuffin
Items.Description: An Adventure where you need to steal the MacGuffin
Items.DescriptionTemplate: You must infiltrate the {{Location}} and steal the {{MacGuffin}} from {{Faction.Boss}} and escape from {{Faction}}

Stages.Name: Infiltrate
Stages.DescriptionTemplate: You must infiltrate the {{Location}} without being detected
